#summary Diff support for Java.

Simple diff algorithm implementation. Support for incremental diff and ready to use in UI or HTML.

To build it for your project use follow:
{{{
svn co http://jtrinkets.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/util/jdiff jdiff
cd jdiff
ant
}}}
This will generated two jars in curent directory:
{{{
out/ant/jars/jtrinkets-jdiff-latest.jar
out/ant/jars/jtrinkets-jdiff-latest-sources.jar
}}}

If you will use it on TeamCity then version will be replaceb by build number from TeamCity.
